00030 #ifndef __MemoryNedPooling_H__
00031 #define __MemoryNedPooling_H__
00032 
00033 #if OGRE_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR == OGRE_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR_NEDPOOLING
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre
00036 {
00045     class _OgreExport NedPoolingImpl
00046     {
00047     public:
00048         static void* allocBytes(size_t count, 
00049             const char* file, int line, const char* func);
00050         static void deallocBytes(void* ptr);
00051         static void* allocBytesAligned(size_t align, size_t count, 
00052             const char* file, int line, const char* func);
00053         static void deallocBytesAligned(size_t align, void* ptr);
00054 
00055     };
00056 
00065     class _OgreExport NedPoolingPolicy
00066     {
00067     public:
00068         static inline void* allocateBytes(size_t count, 
00069             const char* file = 0, int line = 0, const char* func = 0)
00070         {
00071             return NedPoolingImpl::allocBytes(count, file, line, func);
00072         }
00073         static inline void deallocateBytes(void* ptr)
00074         {
00075             NedPoolingImpl::deallocBytes(ptr);
00076         }
00078         static inline size_t getMaxAllocationSize()
00079         {
00080             return std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
00081         }
00082 
00083     private:
00084         // No instantiation
00085         NedPoolingPolicy()
00086         { }
00087     };
00088 
00089 
00102     template <size_t Alignment = 0>
00103     class NedPoolingAlignedPolicy
00104     {
00105     public:
00106         // compile-time check alignment is available.
00107         typedef int IsValidAlignment
00108             [Alignment <= 128 && ((Alignment & (Alignment-1)) == 0) ? +1 : -1];
00109 
00110         static inline void* allocateBytes(size_t count, 
00111             const char* file = 0, int line = 0, const char* func = 0)
00112         {
00113             return NedPoolingImpl::allocBytesAligned(Alignment, count, file, line, func);
00114         }
00115 
00116         static inline void deallocateBytes(void* ptr)
00117         {
00118             NedPoolingImpl::deallocBytesAligned(Alignment, ptr);
00119         }
00120 
00122         static inline size_t getMaxAllocationSize()
00123         {
00124             return std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
00125         }
00126     private:
00127         // no instantiation allowed
00128         NedPoolingAlignedPolicy()
00129         { }
00130     };
